attributes.action: Close nurseries and all educational practises during COVID
attributes.additional_details: Keeping early years education open is going to cause a spike & putting healthy people at risk. It is disgusting as these people are being used as some sort of guinea pigs, yet everyone else gets to be protected during the pandemic. They need to realise that the transmission can be stopped even more with these practises closed.
attributes.background: We want to government to close all early years education and stop the spread of coronavirus transmission through it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
